articles.title: SA, other African students 'badly treated at Ukraine borders' - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: Cold and fearful, scores of South Africans, mostly students, have spent nights at the Polish border desperate to flee war-torn Ukraine as tensions and violence escalated in the East European country.
